A

AbbotConvert - Class in edu.unl.abbot.vicar.Convert
Manages all operations needed for a conversion of an input file to an output file using a schema file, correcting for specific known errors produced by Abbot in the output files, and then performing validation checks.

Encodes and decodes to and from Base64 notation.
Base64.InputStream - Class in edu.unl.abbot.vicar.Upload
A Base64.InputStream will read data from another java.io.InputStream, given in the constructor, and encode/decode to/from Base64 notation on the fly.

Constructs a Base64.InputStream in DECODE mode.
Base64.InputStream(InputStream, int) - Constructor for class edu.unl.abbot.vicar.Upload.Base64.InputStream
Constructs a Base64.InputStream in either ENCODE or DECODE mode.
Base64.OutputStream - Class in edu.unl.abbot.vicar.Upload
A Base64.OutputStream will write data to another java.io.OutputStream, given in the constructor, and encode/decode to/from Base64 notation on the fly.
Base64.OutputStream(OutputStream) - Constructor for class edu.unl.abbot.vicar.Upload.Base64.OutputStream
Constructs a Base64.OutputStream in ENCODE mode.
Base64.OutputStream(OutputStream, int) - Constructor for class edu.unl.abbot.vicar.Upload.Base64.OutputStream
Constructs a Base64.OutputStream in either ENCODE or DECODE mode.

E

edu.unl.abbot.vicar - package edu.unl.abbot.vicar
Top level Vicar package.
edu.unl.abbot.vicar.Convert - package edu.unl.abbot.vicar.Convert
Contains functionality to invoke Abbot, correct specific errors in the output files, generate validation reports and report on the progress of these actions.

Produces the main post sign in Vicar page and the utilities necessary for user file management and output file download.

Contains sign in, registration, password reminder and password changing utilities for local sign in and implements OpenID sign in for Yahoo and Google account holders.
edu.unl.abbot.vicar.Upload - package edu.unl.abbot.vicar.Upload
Contains software for handling HTML5 multiple uploads using AJAX and reporting upload progress.
